translations: <非正式>连帽衫，带帽夹克（=hoody）；<非正式>身穿带帽运动衫的人（=hoody）

sentences.sentence: Outside in the square the sun is blazing as around the corner appears a group of young men who can best be described as ‘hoodies’.
sentences.translation: 教堂外的广场上阳光强烈，街角上出现了一群年轻人，这种人该叫他们小混混最合适。

sentences.sentence: To show their perfect match, lovers wear corresponding T-shirts and hoodies, especially when they go out together or when on holiday.
sentences.translation: 为了表示他们是天生一对，情侣们会穿搭配的T恤衫或卫衣，特别是在他们放假一起出门的时候。

sentences.sentence: In a huge double-pane window stands a phalanx of mannequins wearing official Canada shirts and exercise pants, hoodies, scarves, hats and mittens.
sentences.translation: 在一面巨大的双面玻璃橱窗中，一排人造时装模特儿身穿正式的加拿大运动衫、运动裤、外套、 头巾、帽子和手套。
